post.author: r00b
post.body:
I made a squad decal for quake 4, can someone tell me why they glow in the dark and how I can get them to stop glowing?

here is a picture http://rubeng.googlepages.com/penguinsquad.jpg
this is the decal for their shoulder http://rubeng.googlepages.com/decal_penguin.tga

post.author: r00b
post.body: I figured it out, I didn't make a material entry.
